page.title: 14SPORTS AND HOBBIES IN HARLOW
page.content: We found out that children and adults took part in at least sixty different {sports}and{hobbies.}The most popular { hobbies}were, drawing, reading, model making, collecting(coins, badges, shells, eggs, postcards, ,rubbers, stamps, machboxes and football stickers). The most popular{sports were football, swimming, fishing, bike-riding and running. The time which spent on{hobbies}each week was as follows:_up to five hours-48%, 5-10 hours-18%, 10-15 hours_8%,more then 20 hours_14%.10% of people spent no time on{hobbies.}Most people spent up to five hours of their time on{sports. {T.V.}All the people we asked watched television.Some watched as much as eight hours a day.10% of people watched less then one hour,19% watched 1-2 hours, 16% watched more than 6 hours a day.
